page.title: 14INDUSTRY 2
page.content: 1 tonne packs -this looks like sugar crystals.It is expanded 20 times by forcing air into it,so that they become polystyrene beads,which are very light in weight.These are then used to produce surfboards,all kinds of packaging,floats,coving etc.Now they are colouring the beads to produce multicoloured surfboards.Any items made for the MOD are coloured olive green.Items are transported by contracted lorries to the rest of Britain.They do not export because of the volume of the packages and the high cost of transport.The Poron Factory is owned by the Metal Closures Group PLC. {Boat Building.}R.Crane,Foss Quay- General Repairs,Storage,Boat Building. Old Poron Factory- Fibre Glass Catarmarans and Canoes.
